info.name: Dark Comfort for Stylus
info.description: Dark UI theme for Stylus browser extension (Stylish alternative)
info.additionalInfo:
Dark UI theme for Stylus style manager extension for Chromium browser. May work with Firefox too.
Author: R3gi, Czech Republic

Designed to be pleasing for eyes during the whole day!

Feel free to report issues and unthemed items.

If you find it useful, don't be afraid to leave a comment or you can by me a beer ;-)
